title: Possibilities and challenges of cathode materials for Zn-ion batteries
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, 3,676-688
DOI: 10.1039/D3YA00638G, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
R. Ajay Rakkesh, S. Shalini, S. Tharani, D. Durgalakshmi, S. Balakumar
This thorough review explores the potential and obstacles related to cathode materials for zinc-ion batteries (ZIBs), providing insights into recent advancements, significant concerns, and prospective developments.
